snippet.title: Game Intros: Star Trek Armada
snippet.description:
This is the opening introduction of the game Star Trek: Armada, one of my all-time favourite RTS game and one of the best ever Star Trek game.

This game is also becoming somewhat sought after, though not as rare as Star Trek: Armada II. Prices varied widely from between $15US to $40US depending on condition and completeness, on Ebay. I got my copy relatively easy and cheap, from a local online auction site for the Equivalent of just under $8US including postage. Sourcing it from Ebay would be much more expensive, due to both the cost of acquiring and the international postage.

*This is not my creation. Star Trek: Armada was published by Activision and rights are owned as such. The Star Trek franchise is also copyrighted by its respective company.
